check.description: Checks to see if at least one Metadata Language concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept MetadataLanguage is present."
if(MetadataLanguage is not None and len(MetadataLanguage) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "MetadataLanguage concept is not present"
return False
